weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. I'm small and white and make the ground disappear. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm made of tiny ice crystals.
❄️ You can make snowballs with me.
🧣 You need to wear warm clothes when I am around.

weather.question: I have no voice, but I can roar. I can push boats across the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I am made of moving air.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.
🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky. I help plants grow and keep you hydrated. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I come from clouds.
☔ You might need an umbrella when I fall.
🌱 Plants love me.

weather.question: I am a big ball of fire that gives light and heat to the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
🌞 I appear during the day.
😎 You need to wear sunglasses when I am bright.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after the rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I have many colors.
🌦️ You can see me when the sun shines through the rain.
🍀 Some people believe there's a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a violent storm with a rotating column of air. I can cause a lot of damage. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ I have a funnel shape.
🏠 You should take shelter when I am near.
🐄 Sometimes, things fly around in me.

weather.question: I am a large, swirling storm that forms over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the center.
🌊 I bring strong winds and heavy rain.
🌴 I often hit coastal areas.

weather.question: I am a sudden spark of electricity in the sky. I often come with thunder. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can be dangerous.
🌩️ I am caused by storm clouds.
🌳 It is not safe to be near trees when I strike.

weather.question: I am a thick fog that hangs close to the ground, making it hard to see. What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I'm like a cloud on the ground.
🚗 You need to drive slowly when I am present.
👻 I can make things seem mysterious.

weather.question: I am frozen raindrops that fall from the sky during a thunderstorm. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am hard and icy.
🤕 I can hurt if I hit you.
⚾ Sometimes I can be the size of golf balls!

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I move around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves love me!
🚀 Astronauts have walked on me.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a big, hot ball of gas that gives off light and heat. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 Don't look directly at me!
🌞 I'm the center of our solar system.
😎 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I am the red planet, known for rust on my surface. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I'm the color of chocolate... sometimes.
🚀 People are planning to visit me someday.
🤖 Rovers explore me.

cosmos.question: I am the largest planet in our solar system, with a giant red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌪️ My spot is a huge storm.
🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I'm made mostly of gas.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the Sun, mostly found between Mars and Jupiter. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I'm smaller than a planet.
☄️ Sometimes I can fall to Earth.
🧱 I'm made of rock and metal.

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings made of ice and rock. What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are very shiny.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🪐 I'm further from the sun than Jupiter.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a pattern in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 One of my famous examples has a bear in its name!
🗺️ Sailors used me to navigate.
🌠 I have many different shapes and sizes.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system lives inside of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I look like spilled milk across the sky.
🌌 I have billions of stars.
💫 I am a spiral shape.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
🌟 New stars form inside me.
🔭 Telescopes capture amazing pictures of me.

cosmos.question: I am what happens when a very massive star explodes. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 A big explosion!
✨ I'm much brighter than a normal star.
⚫ Black holes can be created from me.
